overview:
An experienced commercial manager with over 14 years experience in sales, operational, numerical and interpersonal skills. A proven track record in the integration of acquired businesses and the successful running of successive divisions within the data & telecommunications arena. Ability to motivate, inspire and communicate with and support both managers, team members and board members. Adept at business promotion/development through the establishment of lasting relationships in both direct and indirect channels and able to remain focused under extreme pressure. Have been personally responsible for the delivery of $90m of yearly revenue at Frontier and over $25m at LCR Telecom and c$9m at Reach.

Raised the seed capital and drove revenues at HWC Enterprises from $0 to $14m in three years (the companies in the group included Word Networks, Whisper Communications and HWC Services).
